title: Number of earthquakes in Italy 2018 - 2019 , by magnitude
summary: This bar chart has 5 categories for the x axis representing Magnitude, and a y axis representing Number of earthquakes.
The highest category is found at Magnitude_0+ where Number of earthquakes is 21869.0.
The lowest category is found at Magnitude_5.5+ where Number of earthquakes is 0.0.
gold: The statistic shows the number of earthquakes in Italy from March 2018 to March 2019 , broken down by magnitude . According to data , no earthquakes with 5.5+ magnitude occurred in Italy over the period considered .
